tier.item: (37) Soulik oh Ewalt oh Casiano oh Damian pahn doadoahk lakapw.
Soulik and Ewalt and Casiano and Damian work tomorrow
`Soulik, Ewalt, Casiano and Damian will work tomorrow.'
(37) Soulik oh Ewalt oh Casiano oh Damian pahn doadoahk lakapw.
Soulik and Ewalt and Casiano and Damian FUT work tomorrow
`Soulik, Ewalt, Casiano and Damian will work tomorrow.'
Soulik oh Ewalt oh Casiano oh Damian pahn doadoahk lakapw.
Soulik and Ewalt and Casiano and Damian FUT work tomorrow
Soulik, Ewalt, Casiano and Damian will work tomorrow.

tier.item: (76) a. Soulik pahn mwenge oh e pahn meir.
Soulik eat and he FUT sleep
`Soulik will eat and he will sleep.'

`Soulik will eat and he will sleep.'
